title: ConicSensor
description: A conical sensor volume taking into account occlusion of an ellipsoid, i.e., the globe.

show.description: Whether or not the entire conical sensor is shown.

innerHalfAngle.description: The inner half angle of the cone.

outerHalfAngle.description: The outer half angle of the cone.

minimumClockAngle.description: The minimum clock angle limit of the cone.

maximumClockAngle.description: The maximum clock angle limit of the cone.

radius.description: The radial limit of the sensor.

showIntersection.description: Whether or not the intersection of the sensor with the Earth is shown.

intersectionColor.description: The color of the intersection of the sensor with the Earth.

intersectionWidth.description: The width of the intersection in pixels.

showLateralSurfaces.description: Whether or not the lateral surfaces, i.e., the outer sides of the sensor, are shown.

lateralSurfaceMaterial.description: The material to use for the sensor's lateral surface, i.e., the outer sides of the sensor.

showEllipsoidSurfaces.description: Whether or not ellipsoid surfaces are shown.

ellipsoidSurfaceMaterial.description: The material to use for the sensor's ellipsoid surfaces.

showEllipsoidHorizonSurfaces.description: Whether or not ellipsoid horizon surfaces are shown.

ellipsoidHorizonSurfaceMaterial.description: The material to use for the sensor's ellipsoid horizon surfaces.

showDomeSurfaces.description: Whether or not dome surfaces are shown.

domeSurfaceMaterial.description: The material to use for the sensor's dome surfaces.

portionToDisplay.description: What part of the sensor should be displayed.

environmentConstraint.description: Whether or not the sensor will intersect the environment, e.g. terrain or models.

showEnvironmentOcclusion.description: Whether or not the portion of the terrain occluded by the environment will be drawn with a separate material.

environmentOcclusionMaterial.description: The material to use for the portion of the sensor occluded by the environment.

showEnvironmentIntersection.description: Whether or not a line showing where the sensor intersects the environment will be drawn.

environmentIntersectionColor.description: The color of the intersection line between the sensor and the environment.

environmentIntersectionWidth.description: The width in meters of the intersection line between the sensor and the environment.
